No Games Found

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Game } from 'src/app/models/game.model'; import { GamesService } from 'src/app/services/games.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-games-list', templateUrl: './games-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./games-list.component.css'] }) export class GamesListComponent implements OnInit{ games: Game[] = []; constructor(private gamesServices : GamesService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.gamesServices.getAllGames() .subscribe({ next: (games) => { this.games = games; }, error: (response) => { console.log(response); } }); } }
